title: All my emails in a specific folder seems to be lost :-(
content:
Can I find all my emails again please please help me!!!

I don't even know how to explain what happened - I just know this is my booked jobs for the rest of the 2025!! The folders are "greyed out" and it says "0kb"

I see the emails on webmail though - but not my own answer emails and not in folders (= very messy)

I really really don't know what to do!

THANK YOU SO MUCH in advance
creator: mail1327
